content: if you re searching for the perfect crochet crop top pattern look no further this beginner friendly v-neck crop top is super fun to make and perfect to keep you cool while looking hot in the summer months get started today on this fun and easy pattern that will build your confidence in your crochet abilities **materials ** -a size e-4 3 5 mm crochet hook -we crochet/knit picks cotlin dk weight yarn in swan approximate yardage 275 320 380 430 490 for sizes xs s m l xl -stitch marker -yarn/tapestry needle **sizes ** this crop top can be made in the following sizes xs s m l xl ﻿**skill level ** ﻿advanced beginner
